data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: When it comes to the idea of paradise, the first image that comes into my mind is a clean, wide stretch of sandy beach where there is twilight for eternity with coconut trees all around. The weather there should be pleasantly comfortable all year round. BBQ parties and bonfires with an endless stock of good quality beer and sodas should be offered free of charge. Singers with amazingly beautiful voices accompanied by guitar perform by the sea. It must be an environment so relaxing that no more matters would bother you. Everything is in one peace, and you can finally have a good rest in happiness and harmony. (108字)
data.referenceTranslate: 描述一下你对天堂的概念。
